definition: to close (a door)/to eclipse/muddled/stupid/ignorant/variant of 暗[an4]

sentences.english: However, the moonlit glare washes this rather faint constellation from the sky tonight.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，月光洗去了今晚天际中星星们昏暗的光。

sentences.english: He turned, his eyes huge and bright even in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 他转过身来，在昏暗中也能看出他的眼睛又大又亮。

sentences.english: Both the West Side and a large part of the East Side are very well lit.
sentences.chinese: 无论是西口和一个大的一部分，东口非常昏暗。

sentences.english: In the dim light of the daybreak, I saw a dark shape looming athwart the door.
sentences.chinese: 在拂晓前昏暗的光线中，我看到一个黑影挡在门口。

sentences.english: Dim lights flickered above the noodle stalls.
sentences.chinese: 昏暗的光在面条摊上忽闪着。

sentences.english: A pudgy hostess leads us to a dimly lit private room without windows.
sentences.chinese: 一个矮墩墩的女服务员领我们到了一个昏暗的包间。

sentences.english: The mail reached London at the dreary hour of five.
sentences.chinese: 邮车到达伦敦是在天已昏暗的五点钟。

sentences.english: As the moon eclipses the sun the sky grows darker.
sentences.chinese: 当月球遮住太阳时，天空渐渐变得昏暗了。

sentences.english: The hall is not dim; the four large lamps irradiate it.
sentences.chinese: 大厅并不昏暗，四盏巨大的灯照亮了它。

sentences.english: It was nearly dark by the time the removal vans left.
sentences.chinese: 当搬家卡车离开时天已几乎昏暗了。

sentences.english: The Fortunate Life Ridge station platform is narrow, dusky and exceptionally quiet.
sentences.chinese: 地铁福寿岭站站台狭窄，光线昏暗，安静异常。

sentences.english: Guys and Dolls crowded under the dim light with drinking, dancing, having fun.
sentences.chinese: 昏暗灯光下的红男绿女挤在一起喝酒，跳舞，玩乐。

sentences.english: I regarded him once more in this dim light.
sentences.chinese: 借着昏暗的光线，我再次打量了他一番。

sentences.english: The twilight and stillness of the drawing-room seemed to increase his numbness.
sentences.chinese: 起居室里昏暗的灯光和沉静的气氛使他越发显得麻木。

sentences.english: It's a low-lit upmarket pub with a wood-panelled games room.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个昏暗的高档酒吧，有一个全木装修的游戏室。

sentences.english: The eyes need several minutes to adjust to the dimness.
sentences.chinese: 需要花几分钟的时间使眼睛适应昏暗。

pinyin: shen1 shou3 bu4 jian4 wu3 zhi3

definition: pitch-black/(fig.) to be completely in the dark
pitch-black/(fig.) to be completely in the dark
